General.Name: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited
General.Description: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited engages in the distribution and installation of computer network systems in Thailand. It operates through Sales Including Instalment; Maintenance services; and Others segments. The company also distributes and installs fully integrated communication, wireless communication, network security, and management systems, as well as offers network system management and data center solutions. In addition, it provides maintenance services; surveys and installs telecommunication lines; and distributes and services information system security. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
